executable.title: B-Spline Transform Inversion
executable.description: This program will invert a B-Spline transform using a thin-plate spline approximation.
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this version of the GTRACT program was provided by NIH/NINDS R01NS050568-01A2S1
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Vincent Magnotta and Greg Harris.

parameters.label: Input Image Files
parameters.description: Parameters for specifying the B-Spline transform and the space to invert it in.

image.name: inputReferenceVolume
image.description: Required: input image file name to exemplify the anatomical space to interpolate over.
image.label: Input Reference Image Volume

transform.name: inputTransform
transform.description: Required: input B-Spline transform file name
transform.label: Input B-Spline Transform

parameters.label: Output Image Files
parameters.description: Output file from conversion from Dicom to Nrrd

parameters.label: Transform Conversion Parameters
parameters.description: Input parameters controlling the approximation of a B-Spline inverse by a thin-plate spline.

integer-vector.name: landmarkDensity
integer-vector.description: Number of landmark subdivisions in all 3 directions
integer-vector.label: Landmark Density

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
